issue.title: [Python] Generate union and extension typed arrays with hypothesis
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10212](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10212). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These types are missing from tests/strategies.py, but for comprehensive roundtrip tests we should add those as well.
